good.name: Skimmed Milk
good.reason: High-quality source of dairy protein and essential calcium.

good.name: Milk Solids
good.reason: Provides additional protein content to reach the 25g target.

good.name: Cocoa Powder
good.reason: Natural flavoring that contains beneficial antioxidants.

okay.name: Water
okay.reason: Used as a base for consistency.

okay.name: Nature Identical Flavouring Substances
okay.reason: Standard food-grade flavoring, though chemically synthesized to mimic natural flavor.

okay.name: Acidity Regulators (INS 340, 452, 339)
okay.reason: Common phosphate-based additives used for stability; generally safe but indicate high processing.

okay.name: Edible Common Salt
okay.reason: Used in small amounts to enhance flavor profile.

bad.name: Stabilizer (INS 407 / Carrageenan)
bad.reason: A thickener that has been linked to digestive distress and gut inflammation in some studies.

bad.name: Sweetener (INS 955 / Sucralose)
bad.reason: An artificial sweetener that avoids sugar calories but may negatively impact gut microbiome health.

good.name: Salmon Fish Oil
good.reason: A rich source of essential Omega-3 fatty acids that support heart and brain health.

good.name: EPA (Eicosapentaenoic acid)
good.reason: Helps reduce inflammation and supports cardiovascular health.

good.name: DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid)
good.reason: Crucial for brain function, eye health, and nervous system maintenance.

good.name: Vitamin E (DL-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate)
good.reason: Acts as an antioxidant to prevent the fish oil from oxidizing and going rancid.

okay.name: Gelatin
okay.reason: Standard pharmaceutical-grade material for softgel capsules; however, it is animal-derived (non-vegetarian).

okay.name: Glycerol (INS 422)
okay.reason: A safe humectant used to keep the capsule shell flexible.

okay.name: Sorbitol (INS 420 (ii))
okay.reason: A sugar alcohol used as a plasticizer in the capsule shell; safe in small amounts.

okay.name: Purified Water
okay.reason: Standard solvent used in the manufacturing of the capsule shell.

okay.name: Triethyl Citrate (INS 1505)
okay.reason: A food-grade stabilizer and plasticizer generally recognized as safe.

okay.name: Ethyl Vanillin
okay.reason: An artificial flavoring agent used to mask the fishy smell; generally safe but synthetic.

okay.name: Methacrylic Acid
okay.reason: Used in the coating of the capsule to ensure it dissolves in the right part of the digestive tract.

bad.name: Methylparaben (INS 218)
bad.reason: A preservative from the paraben family; while legally permitted, some consumers avoid it due to concerns regarding potential endocrine disruption.

good.name: KSM-66 Ashwagandha
good.reason: A high-quality, clinically studied full-spectrum root extract that helps reduce stress, improve cognition, and boost energy.

okay.name: HPMC Capsule Shell
okay.reason: A safe, plant-based capsule material (Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose) suitable for vegetarians; it is inert and non-toxic.

good.name: KSM-66 Ashwagandha Root Extract
good.reason: A highly researched, full-spectrum adaptogen that helps reduce cortisol (stress), improves muscle recovery, and supports cognitive function.

okay.name: HPMC Capsule shell
okay.reason: A standard plant-based (vegan) capsule material that is inert and generally recognized as safe for consumption.

good.name: Cocoa Solids
good.reason: Contains flavonoids and antioxidants beneficial for heart health.

good.name: Cashew Nuts
good.reason: Provides healthy fats, protein, and essential minerals.

good.name: Raisins
good.reason: A source of fiber and natural energy, though high in natural sugar.

good.name: Apricot Kernels
good.reason: Contains healthy monounsaturated fats and some fiber.

okay.name: Cocoa Butter
okay.reason: A natural plant-based fat, though very high in calories.

okay.name: Natural & Nature Identical Flavours
okay.reason: Used for taste; generally safe but less ideal than whole food flavorings.

bad.name: Sugar
bad.reason: The primary ingredient; high consumption is linked to obesity and metabolic issues.

bad.name: Emulsifiers (442, 476)
bad.reason: Highly processed additives used to improve texture; some studies suggest potential gut health impacts.

bad.name: Artificial Flavouring Substances (Ethyl Vanillin)
bad.reason: Synthetic chemicals used to mimic natural flavors.

good.name: Panax Ginseng Extract
good.reason: An herbal extract traditionally used for cognitive function and energy.

good.name: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
good.reason: An essential nutrient that helps the body convert food into energy.

good.name: Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6)

good.name: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
good.reason: A vitamin needed for growth and overall good health.

good.name: Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12)
good.reason: Essential for red blood cell formation and neurological function.

okay.reason: Standard base for carbonated beverages.

okay.name: Citric Acid
okay.reason: A common acidulant used for flavor and preservation.

okay.name: Sodium Citrate
okay.reason: Used as an acidity regulator and buffer.

okay.name: Natural Flavors
okay.reason: Vague term for flavorings derived from natural sources.

okay.name: Taurine
okay.reason: An amino acid that is generally safe in moderation, though its long-term effects in high-dose energy drinks are still studied.

okay.name: L-Carnitine L-Tartrate
okay.reason: A compound involved in energy metabolism.

okay.name: Salt (Sodium Chloride)
okay.reason: Used for flavor and electrolyte balance.

okay.name: Inositol
okay.reason: A type of sugar that helps with cell structure and insulin signaling.

okay.name: Maltodextrin
okay.reason: A carbohydrate used as a filler; safe but has a high glycemic index.

okay.name: Anthocyanins (Color Added)
okay.reason: Natural pigments from plants used for coloring.

bad.name: Sugar / Sucrose
bad.reason: High intake is linked to obesity, type 2 diabetes, and heart disease.

bad.name: Glucose Syrup
bad.reason: A highly processed sweetener with a high glycemic index that causes rapid blood sugar spikes.

bad.name: Caffeine
bad.reason: High levels can cause jitters, insomnia, and increased heart rate.

bad.name: Guarana Seed Extract
bad.reason: Acts as an additional source of caffeine, increasing the total stimulant load.

bad.name: Sorbic Acid

bad.name: Benzoic Acid

bad.name: Sucralose

bad.name: D-Glucuronolactone
bad.reason: A synthetic chemical with limited data on long-term safety in high concentrations.

13f91f6b-26cb-4566-aaf1-d0d5bae6f3f8.product_name: 10% Vitamin C + Ferulic Acid + Vitamin E Serum

good.name: Water
good.reason: Essential solvent and base for the serum.

good.name: L-Ascorbic Acid
good.reason: Pure Vitamin C; a potent antioxidant that brightens skin and boosts collagen production.

good.name: Alpha Tocopherol
good.reason: Vitamin E; an antioxidant that works synergistically with Vitamin C to protect against UV damage.

good.name: Panthenol
good.reason: Pro-vitamin B5; known for its soothing, anti-inflammatory, and hydrating properties.

good.name: Ferulic Acid
good.reason: Plant-based antioxidant that stabilizes Vitamin C and doubles its photoprotection.

good.name: Sodium Hyaluronate
good.reason: A salt form of hyaluronic acid that deeply hydrates the skin by attracting moisture.

good.name: Dehydroacetic Acid
good.reason: A safe, effective preservative often used in clean beauty formulations.

okay.name: Ethoxydiglycol
okay.reason: A solvent and penetration enhancer; generally safe but may cause slight irritation in very sensitive skin.

okay.name: Propylene Glycol
okay.reason: A common humectant and solvent; safe for most but can be a sensitizer for a small percentage of users.

okay.name: Polysorbate 80
okay.reason: An emulsifier used to blend oil and water; considered safe but sometimes avoided in strict 'clean' beauty standards.

okay.name: Benzylalcohol
okay.reason: A preservative and solvent; while effective, it is a known potential allergen for sensitive skin types.

de42d933-7f66-4fb8-b0cb-6baacf452826.product_name: Bright Healthy Radiance Gentle Renewing Cleanser

good.name: Aqua
good.reason: Essential solvent that forms the base of the cleanser.

good.name: Decyl Glucoside
good.reason: A very mild, plant-derived surfactant ideal for sensitive skin.

good.name: Glycerin
good.reason: A powerful humectant that helps the skin retain moisture during cleansing.

good.name: Niacinamide
good.reason: Vitamin B3 that brightens skin, improves texture, and strengthens the barrier.

good.name: Pancratium Maritimum Extract
good.reason: Also known as Sea Daffodil, it helps reduce the appearance of dark spots.

good.name: Jojoba Esters
good.reason: Provides gentle physical exfoliation and releases Vitamin E into the skin.

good.name: Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol
good.reason: A patented hydrating complex (Aquaxyl) that boosts skin hydration.

good.name: Tocopheryl Acetate
good.reason: A stable form of Vitamin E that provides antioxidant protection.

okay.name: Sodium Cocoamphoacetate
okay.reason: A mild cleansing agent that helps create a soft foam.

okay.name: Coco-Betaine
okay.reason: A gentle co-surfactant that improves lather and skin conditioning.

okay.name: Sodium Chloride
okay.reason: Common salt used to adjust the viscosity of the product.

okay.name: Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer
okay.reason: A synthetic polymer used as a thickener and emulsion stabilizer.

okay.name: Phenoxyethanol
okay.reason: A common preservative used to keep the product free of bacteria.

okay.name: Sodium Benzoate
okay.reason: A safe preservative used to maintain product shelf life.

okay.name: CI 77491
okay.reason: A mineral-based iron oxide used to color the exfoliating beads.

good.reason: The essential base solvent for the formula.

good.name: Glycerin
good.reason: A powerful humectant that helps the skin retain moisture and stay hydrated.

good.name: Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate

good.name: Zinc Gluconate

okay.name: Zinc Coceth Sulfate

okay.name: Sodium Benzoate

bad.reason: A known fragrance allergen that can cause contact dermatitis.

bad.reason: An artificial flavoring agent used as a cheaper alternative to natural vanilla.

bad.name: Invert Sugar
bad.reason: An additional highly processed liquid sugar used to maintain moisture.
